DOC.brief_summary: Cryopreservation embryos transfer subsequently assist reproductive technology ( ART ) cycle improve outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Replacement Fresh Embryo Transfers ( ETs ) Frozen Embryo Transfers ( FETs ) Using Vitrification
DOC.detailed_description: All patient initial cohort treat long protocol ovarian stimulation . For pituitary down-regulation , patient treat daily administration 0.5 mg buserelin ( suprefact , Aventis , Frankfurt , Germany ) day 21 menstrual cycle . Buserelin reduce 0.25 mg daily ovary quiescent ultrasound , COH initiate recombinant FSH ( Gonal F , Serono , Aubnne , Switzerland ) 150 IU/day day 2 withdrawal bleeding . Serial ultrasound examination evaluation serum E2 level use assess ovarian response , gonadotropin dose adjustment do require . Human chorionic gonadotropin ( pregnyl , Organon , Oss , Netherlands ) 10,000 IU administer least two follicle reach mean diameter 18 mm . Oocyte retrieval perform 34-36 hour hCG administration conventional insemination ICSI perform clinically appropriate . In 187 patient allocate fresh ET group , ET perform day 2 . Embryos transfer ultrasound guidance , C.C.D . embryo transfer catheter ( Laboratory C.C.D. , Paris , France ) . Luteal support progesterone oil ( Progesterone , Aburaihan Co. , Tehran , Iran ) 100 mg daily IM start day oocyte retrieval continue documentation fetal heart activity ultrasound . In 187 patient allocated FET group , cryopreservation embryo undertaken vitrification Cryotop method two month , embryos transfer . The protocol Cryotop vitrification embryo describe previously ( Kuwayama et al. , 2005 ; Kuwayama , 2007 ) . After two-step loading equilibration solution contain 7.5 % ( v/v ) ethylene glycol 7.5 % ( v/v ) dimethyl sulfoxide , vitrification solution contain 15 % ( v/v ) ethylene glycol , 15 % ( v/v ) dimethyl sulfoxide 0.5 mol/L sucrose , embryo load narrow glass capillary onto Cryotop volume < 0.1 µL . After load , almost solution remove leave thin layer cover embryo , sample quickly immerse liquid nitrogen ( LN ) . Subsequently , plastic cap pull film part Cryotop , sample store LN . At warm , protective cap remove Cryotop still submerge LN Cryotop immerse directly 37˚C medium contain sucrose . The embryo sequentially incubated diluent solution vitro culture transfer . Patients prepared ET oral E2 attain endometrial thickness ≥ 8 mm triple line pattern ultrasound scan . At time , patient give 100 mg IM progesterone oil daily ET preform three day later abdominal ultrasound guidance describe earlier . Oral E2 progesterone continue documentation fetal heart activity ultrasonography .
DOC.criteria: age < 38 normal day 3 FSH classify high risk OHSS ≥ 15 follicle mean diameter ≥ 12 mm per ovary E2 level day hCG administration > 3000 pg/mL undergo first assist reproduction treatment cycle goodquality embryos appropriate cryopreservation
